name: Special Topics in Book and Media Studies II
description: Various topics are taken up each year, the content of which depends on the instructor. Students should check the college website for details.
exclusions: SMC301H1 (Special Topics in Book and Media Studies II: Seriality) completed in Fall 2016; SMC301H1 (Special Topics in Book and Media Studies II: Seriality and Transmedia) completed in Winter 2018
